Moovit is one app for all your urban mobility and transit rides. 

Transportation is an integral part of urban living. Whether you ride the train, subway, bus, light rail, ferry or metro, use dockless scooters, bikes, ride-sharing like Uber or Lyft, getting the best urban mobility information is critical. Enter Moovit! Moovit provides riders with a one-stop-shop journey experience to help them get from point A to B in the easiest and most efficient way. Get train and bus times, maps, and real-time arrival information with ease so that you can plan your trip with confidence. Pay and validate your rides. Find critical alerts and service disruptions for your favorite lines. Get step-by-step directions of optimal route bus, train, metro, bike, scooter or a combination of them.

Moovit is your personal assistant for all your transit rides! 

► Real-time arrivals. View real-time arrival information, which is taken directly from GPS devices positioned on buses and trains. Avoid wasting time guessing train times or bus times.

Huntloc is a real-time hunting, tracking and management app for hunting teams and provides tracking devices for hunting dogs. You can see the movement of hunting dogs and other hunters on your smartphone, share information between hunters and create your own hunting map.

Tracking a common hunt is easy
One of the members of the hunt starts hunting on his or her phone and receives a unique code. Other hunters join the hunt using this code. This creates a hunting team whose movement is visible on the phone map. When the owner of a hunting dog with a Huntloc tracking device joins the hunt, all participants will also be able to see the dog's location. 
Hunting with Huntloc is more effective, safer and more fun
•	While on a common hunt, your phone shows the current location of dogs and hunters, the direction of movement, the pace of movement, and the distance traveled. Hunting and dog tracking are unlimited in distance.
•	During the hunt, you can send messages to the participants and share the location of the various hunting events on the map (e.g., a caught game, an animal track, etc.). Plus, you can quickly call any hunter.
•	The different maps of Google and the Estonian Land Board and the hunting objects recorded by the hunter themselves (e.g., animal feeding places and other hunting-related locations and areas) give an accurate overview of the hunting ground. You can share your hunting objects with other Huntloc users. 
•	When navigating in the hunt, you can set a navigation target and then use the compass view to arrive at the desired location by the shortest route.
•	A 24-hour weather forecast with sunrise and sunset time will help you plan your hunt. You can view the weather forecast for your own location or for a location selected on the map.
•	Huntloc's portal.huntloc.com can be used for viewing the hunts you have participated in and for more convenient drawing of the hunting card.

The location of a dog with the Huntloc tracking device can be seen on your smartphone
The Huntloc tracking device provides a very accurate position of the dog in the terrain. The tracking device uses the mobile network and has no distance limitation - the dog can be tracked from thousands of kilometers away. All you need is a smartphone to monitor your dog and control your device. In addition to tracking, you can call the dog, listen to the dog's activities and give voice commands. Keeping the device constantly on the dog's neck, it acts as a security device and can be switched on from a distance when the dog is lost. 

The tracking device is very strong, lightweight, waterproof and has a long service life. The monitoring time is 36 hours (10 seconds interval) and the standby time is 1 month. In order to ensure waterproofing, there are no openings or buttons on the unit, and the 3 indicator lights indicate the unit's operating status. The device is charged wirelessly.

1) Подбор маршрута От и До на общественном транспорте

Подбор включает все виды наземного транспорта, а также электрички и метро Санкт-Петербурга.

Раздел поможет доехать до на общественном транспорте быстро и без проблем!

2) Подробная информация по маршрутам и расписанию наземного транспорта

Информация по номеру маршрута включает карту проезда, расписание автобусов в течение дня, а также временные изменения трассы (доступны все автобусы, троллейбусы, трамваи Санкт-Петербурга!)

На карте можно посмотреть транспорт онлайн в реальном времени, выбрать нужный маршрут и узнать все необходимую информацию.

Данные по маршруту включают трассу на карте города, время работы и стоимость проезда. Также доступно оффлайн расписание по остановкам в течение дня.

Вкладка "Изменения" содержит новости о временных изменениях трассы выбранного маршрута.

В приложении также указывается время прибытия при просмотре остановок общественного транспорта - онлайн при наличии данных, либо ближайшее время по расписанию маршрута.

3) Схема метро СПб с расчетом времени поездки и режим работы станций

В разделе метро представлена схема метро Санкт-Петербурга с функцией расчета времени в пути между двумя станциями.

Система покажет один или несколько оптимальных вариантов пути на схеме, а также подскажет, в какую часть состава лучше сесть для быстрого выхода/пересадки.

Для каждой станции указывается режим работы: время открытия/закрытия, а также время отправления первых/последних поездов.  Также приложение подскажет информацию о временных изменениях в работе той или иной станции.


4) Пополнение карты "Подорожник" онлайн!

В нашем приложении можно без комиссии пополнить "Подорожник" онлайн банковской картой.

При авторизации доступно сохранение введенных номеров - не придется при каждом пополнении "Подорожника" снова вводить данные проездного!

5) Поиск расписаний электричек по направлениям или станциям

Вкладка "Электрички" раздела "Справочник маршрутов" позволяет найти расписание электричек пригородных направлений Петербурга на текущую дату.

В результатах указывается время отправления/прибытия на искомые станции и начальные/конечные станции маршрута.

По каждому номеру электрички доступна подробная информация - регулярность и промежуточные станции на маршруте.

Доступен просмотр данных по конкретной станции - поиск выдает все пригородные электрички с остановкой на искомой станции в течение дня.

Note: OnCourse is not AIS, OnCourse simulates the data transmitted by AIS transponders; however, it only transmits data through the Internet and not over AIS radio-frequencies. The information transmitted by OnCourse is not visible by the AIS receivers of other vessels. It will only be displayed on the MarineTraffic website and apps. As such, OnCourse is a self-reporting tool that does not substitute AIS transmissions and it is not, by any means, related to the safety and navigation equipment of a vessel.

Intended use
Provided that Internet connectivity is available, the vessel's positions will start being reported once the OnCourse application is launched on your mobile device. Positions will continue being reported even if the app is running in the background! Broadcasting must be turned off whenever the device leaves the vessel.

Die Zeit vergeht, und die Landschaften ändern sich, es ist sehr schwierig, auf einem riesigen Feld ein uraltes Geisterdorf zu finden. Das schafft erhebliche Hindernisse für Lokalhistoriker und Liebhaber der Antike. Vetus Maps löst dieses Problem! Jetzt alle notwendigen Alte-Karten der Landkreise und Provinzen in Ihrem Smartphone. Die Anwendung ermöglicht es Ihnen, die alte Karte auf die entsprechnede moderne Karte zu übertragen.

Anwendungsmerkmale:

- Übertragung auf eine moderne Karte (Satellit, Hybrid, Gelände)
- Änderung der Transparenz der Karte
- Kartenkatalog zum Herunterladen
- Markierungen setzen
- GPS-Tracks aufzeichnen
- Suche nach Orten

Auf den alten Karten ist eine große Anzahl verschiedener Objekte angegeben, die man als wertvolle Datenquelle für die Toponymie verwenden kann, da viele Namen verloren gegangen sind - sie sind auf keiner topographischen topografischen Karte zu finden. Selbst in unserer heutigen Zeit, viele Jahre später, kann man mit Hilfe dieser Karten recht sicher durch die Landschaft navigieren.

Alte Karten sind immer offline verfügbar, für Satellitenkarten ist eine Internetverbindung erforderlich. Die Markerinstallation erfolgt durch langes Drücken auf die Karte

GPS Coordinates is your personal application through which you can easily track all the location details which you have visited.
It can show you Latitude and longitude of your particular location. You can also share these details to anyone via different sharing options.

YOUR APP FOR OFF-PEAK ELECTRICITY USE AND SMART CHARGING

Available for all EU countries. 
Electric vehicles supported: Tesla, Volkswagen ID, Škoda, Seat, Cupra, Ford Mustang Mach-E, Kia and Hyundai.
Solar inverters supported: Fronius, Fusionsolar (Huawei), Solaredge, Ferroamp.

AVOID PEAK-HOURS TO TACKLE THE ENERGY CRISIS

While there are other utility apps available that show up-to-the-minute electricity prices, Gridio sets itself apart by displaying, in real time, a countdown to the next best as well as and worst times to use electricity. With the countdown timer, people who want to set up their home appliances to make the most of low-cost electricity can do so accordingly.

AUTOMATIC ELECTRIC VEHICLE CHARGING WHEN ELECTRICITY IS THE CHEAPEST AND CLEANEST

Gridio automatically charges your car when electricity is the cheapest, and usually the cleanest. After you plug in your vehicle, our algorithms will automatically charge up your vehicle’s battery by your desired time, when electricity is the cheapest. You can automatically avoid expensive peak-time hours, and by doing so help the grid as well as save on your energy bill, if you have dynamic tariffs. 

MAKE THE MOST OF YOUR SOLAR PANELS

Gridio maximizes your home solar use, by automatically charging your car when you produce enough solar and stopping the charging when the solar production drops. This allows you to maximize your self-consumption of solar and makes your EV an even greener member of our world. You can set your solar charge limits yourself, and soon we will also add automatic price optimization to it.

NO HARDWARE REQUIRED

Everything works through the app - you connect your vehicle securely to Gridio, set your charging needs and we will take care of the rest

***

If you are using the Gridio app, please let us know what you think. How could we make your life easier? You can provide feedback through support@gridio.io.
If you have further questions, visit www.gridio.io and check out our FAQ section in the app and online.

Also, please like us on Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/gridio.io/
